mapper.select: select rownum, u_id as "uId", u_name as "uName", major , grade, phone, u_type as "uType", password, email, subject_id as "subjectId" from( select rownum as rnum, u_id , u_name, major, grade, phone, u_type, password, email, subject_id from( select u_id , u_name, major, grade, phone, u_type, password, email, subject_id from( select u_id , u_name, major, grade, phone, u_type, password, email, subject_id from users where subject_id = #{subjectId} ) order by u_id desc ) where rownum <= #{end} ) where rnum >= #{start}
